full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Tenders for Sprinkler Maintenance in Sept-Îles, Quebec

#### Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3231104141 - Documentation #3773606440
* **Publication Date**: 2022-12-01
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-02-07, 14:00 EST
* **Contract Span**: 2023-02-07 to 2024-03-31
* **Category**: Service

#### Description

This government tender solicitation is for the acquisition of sprinkler inspection and maintenance services in Sept-Îles, Quebec, Canada. The contract duration spans from 2023-02-07 to 2024-03-31. 

**Important Details**

* Previous bid solicitation # Doc3280812665 dated 2022-05-26 is hereby canceled and superseded by this new solicitation.
* A debriefing or feedback session will be provided to bidders who submitted offers on the previous solicitation.
* Bids must be submitted by 14:00 EST on 2023-02-07. Bids received after this time will be deemed non-responsive.

#### Procurement Information

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

#### Original Bidder Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) - Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **Contact Person**: Marie-Claude Dugal, SPAC/PSPC - marie-claude.dugal@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Relevant Links

* [Tender Notice Website URL](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14788313?extsite=MTQ3ODgzMTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Additional Information**

* For more details about this tender solicitation and the requisites for bid submission, refer to the [Tender Notice Website URL](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14788313?extsite=MTQ
